SetupTraits.Name: Kin
SetupTraits.Description: Ancient Jotunn are kin, can be bargained with, and will flee or surrender if heavily losing a fight.

ListedItems.Name: Motivations
ListedItems.Description: Jotunn are motivated strongly by their negative emotions (sadness, anger, distrust, ennui, hunger, etc). Appeasing them or appealing to their feelings can soften them and make them open to negotiation.

ListedItems.Name: Flee
ListedItems.Description: Jotunn typically don't flee but value their lives and will surrender if they see no chance of winning a fight.

SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description: Blood Jotunn are infected with the Blood Rage. Born of the slaying of the Titans, they are driven only by their pain and rage. Treat them like monsters - they do not flee or negotiate. It might be possible to cure the Rage.

SetupTraits.Name: Titan Armament
SetupTraits.Description: You can arm a Jotunn with Titansteel weaponry (Adding the Special Template). This increases a Jotunn's encounter budget cost by +1. If you do, they can take 1 extra turn a round, and 1/round may dash 2 as a free action, then deal [fray] damage to all adjacent foes.
